**Example 1: 修改cos导入任务**

修改cos导入任务

Input: 

```
tccli cls ModifyCosRecharge --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --Id ca092608-98e8-4ad9-83c5-a6b3bbexxxxx \
    --TopicId ae13f7db-00b5-41ac-916e-407802axxxxx \
    --Name test_name
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "dc78ee34-237b-41c7-8fcd-601a99bxxxxx"
    }
}
```
